scripts.check:node-registry: rm -rf .tmp-node-registry-check && tsc --target ES2020 --module commonjs --moduleResolution node --skipLibCheck --strict --outDir .tmp-node-registry-check scripts/node_registry_checks.ts src/features/workflow/nodes/coreRegistry.ts src/features/workflow/nodes/definitions/*.ts src/features/workflow/nodes/types.ts src/types/workflow.ts && node -e "require('fs').writeFileSync('.tmp-node-registry-check/package.json', '{\"type\":\"commonjs\"}\\n')" && node .tmp-node-registry-check/scripts/node_registry_checks.js && rm -rf .tmp-node-registry-check
